verses.roman:
brahmā kahe--jale jīve yei nārāyaṇa
se saba tomāra aṁśa--e satya vacana

synonyms: brahmā—Lord Brahmā; kahe—says; jale—in the water; jīve—in the living being; yei—who; nārāyaṇa—Nārāyaṇa; se—They; saba—all; tomāra—Your; aṁśa—plenary part; e—this; satya—truthful; vacana—word.
translation: Brahmā replied, "What I have said is true. The same Lord Nārāyaṇa who lives on the waters and in the hearts of all living beings is but a plenary portion of You.
